meanings.sent1: At the event, the copatrons gathered to celebrate their shared interests.
meanings.sent2: The copatrons of the art gallery contributed to its success.
meanings.sent3: The copatrons decided to throw a surprise party for their mutual friend.
meanings.sent4: The copatrons stood united in their commitment to the cause.
meanings.sent5: The copatrons' collaboration led to a beautiful exhibition.

meanings.definition: Copatrons: those who share the same patronage or support
meanings.sent1: The copatrons of the local bookstore often attend book signings together.
meanings.sent2: She and her copatrons always attend charity events as a group.
meanings.sent3: The copatrons joked that they should start a fan club for their favorite author.
meanings.sent4: Their copatronage was evident in their joint efforts to help the community.
meanings.sent5: The copatrons' shared passion for reading brought them together.

meanings.definition: Copatrons: individuals who jointly support or sponsor something
meanings.sent1: The copatrons of the charity event raised funds for a good cause.
meanings.sent2: As copatrons of the theater, they often attend performances together.
meanings.sent3: The copatrons decided to pool their resources to make a bigger impact.
meanings.sent4: Their copatronage ensured the success of the community project.
meanings.sent5: The copatrons' teamwork made the event a memorable experience.
